response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value to me. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its immense worth and align with your perceived valuation of $800,000, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer or if you require further information about the product. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 1200000}
